mdRecord.dcterms:title: VA Association of Fire Chiefs Memorandums Regarding Convention Reservations and Advertising, September 22, 1953 - January 6, 1954
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Memorandums written on January 6, 1954, concerning the VA Association of Fire Chiefs' convention to be held in Danville, as well as gathering advertisement opportunities to help fund these conventions.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Fire departments
Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
